homework1

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • homework1.Account

  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object

    Account class

    This class includes accounts to be created in a simple social media design, features that are in every account, and functions that an account can do.

    • Method Detail

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        This method is used to access the user name of the account.
        Returns:
        Returns the username of the account

      • login

        public void login()
        This method allows logging into the account and checking the login.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        This method allows logging out of the account and checking the login.

      • addPost

        public void addPost(int postId,
                    java.lang.String content)
        This method allows post sharing on the user's account. In order to share a post, it is necessary to log in to the account.
        Parameters:
        postId -
        content - The content of the post to be added

      • follow

        public void follow(Account act)

        This method allows the users to follow other accounts.

        If the account is logged in and an account that has not been followed before is wanted to be followed, the follow-up process is performed.
        Parameters:
        act - User account to be followed

      • viewProfile

        public void viewProfile(Account act)

        This method is used to display the information of an account.

        If the account is logged in and the account to be viewed has not blocked this account, the display is performed.
        Parameters:
        act - User account to be view

      • viewPosts

        public void viewPosts(Account act)

        This method allows to view the posts in the account's profile.

        The profile of the account must be viewed before the posts can be viewed.
        Parameters:
        act - User account to be view posts

      • like

        public void like(int interactionId,
                 Account act,
                 int postId)
        This method allows you to like posts. You must be logged into the account to like.
        Parameters:
        interactionId -
        act - Account of the post to like
        postId - postId to like

      • comment

        public void comment(int interactionId,
                    Account act,
                    int postId,
                    java.lang.String content)
        This method allows you to comment on the post. You must be logged into the account to comment.
        Parameters:
        interactionId -
        act - Account where comments will be made
        postId -
        content -

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(int id,
                        Account act,
                        java.lang.String msg)

        This method provide sending messages to another account.

        Parameters:
        id - message number
        act - the account to which the message will be sent
        msg - content of the message

      • checkOutbox

        public void checkOutbox()
        This methods shows number of messages in outbox.

      • checkInbox

        public void checkInbox()
        This methods shows number of messages in inbox

        public void viewInbox()
        This method shows the messages in the inbox.

      • viewOutbox

        public void viewOutbox()
        This method shows the messages in the outbox.

      • viewInteraction

        public void viewInteraction(Account act)
        This method displays the interaction information (like, comment) of the account's posts.
        Parameters:
        act - The account where the post interactions will be displayed

      • block

        public void block(Account act)
        This method provide to block an account.
        Parameters:
        act - Account to be blocked
